# Untether

> Telegram bridge for AI coding agents. Send tasks by voice or text, stream progress live, and approve changes — from your phone, anywhere. Works with Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode, and Pi.

## Tutorials

- [Install and onboard](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/tutorials/install.md): Setup wizard walkthrough — create a bot, pick a workflow, generate config
- [First run](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/tutorials/first-run.md): Send your first task, watch progress stream, continue conversations
- [Projects and branches](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/tutorials/projects-and-branches.md): Register repos, target them from chat, run on feature branches
- [Multi-engine workflows](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/tutorials/multi-engine.md): Switch between Claude Code, Codex, OpenCode, and Pi
- [Conversation modes](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/tutorials/conversation-modes.md): Assistant, workspace, and handoff modes

## How-to guides

- [Chat sessions](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/chat-sessions.md): Auto-resume and stateless session management
- [Voice notes](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/voice-notes.md): Dictate tasks with Whisper-compatible transcription
- [File transfer](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/file-transfer.md): Upload files to repos, download results back
- [Forum topics](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/topics.md): Map Telegram topics to projects and branches
- [Projects](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/projects.md): Register and manage project aliases
- [Worktrees](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/worktrees.md): Isolated git worktrees for parallel branch work
- [Interactive approval](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/interactive-approval.md): Approve, deny, and discuss tool calls from Telegram
- [Plan mode](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/plan-mode.md): Control plan transitions with progressive cooldown
- [Cost budgets](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/cost-budgets.md): Per-run and daily budget limits, warnings, and auto-cancel
- [Schedule tasks](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/schedule-tasks.md): Telegram scheduling, cron triggers, and webhook triggers
- [Webhooks and cron](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/webhooks-and-cron.md): Automated runs from external events and schedules
- [Switch engines](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/switch-engines.md): Change engines per chat, topic, or message
- [Route by chat](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/route-by-chat.md): Route messages to projects by chat or topic
- [Troubleshooting](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/troubleshooting.md): Common issues, debug logging, and preflight checks
- [Write a plugin](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/write-a-plugin.md): Extend with custom engines, transports, and commands
- [Add a runner](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/add-a-runner.md): Implement a new engine backend
- [Dev setup](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/how-to/dev-setup.md): Development environment and testing

## Reference

- [Configuration](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/config.md): Full config reference for untether.toml
- [Commands and directives](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/commands-and-directives.md): Telegram commands, message directives, CLI flags
- [Context resolution](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/context-resolution.md): How Untether resolves project, branch, engine, and session context
- [Specification](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/specification.md): Normative behaviour spec
- [Environment variables](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/env-vars.md): Env var reference
- [Plugin API](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/plugin-api.md): Plugin development API
- [Triggers](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/triggers/triggers.md): Webhook and cron trigger reference
- [Changelog](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/changelog.md): Version history

## Engine references

- [Claude Code runner](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/claude/runner.md): Permission modes, plan mode, cost tracking, interactive approvals
- [Claude stream-json](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/claude/stream-json-cheatsheet.md): JSONL event shapes for Claude Code
- [Claude event mapping](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/claude/untether-events.md): Claude JSONL to Untether event translation
- [Codex exec-json](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/codex/exec-json-cheatsheet.md): JSONL event shapes for Codex
- [Codex event mapping](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/codex/untether-events.md): Codex JSONL to Untether event translation
- [OpenCode runner](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/opencode/runner.md): Model selection, providers, session IDs
- [OpenCode stream-json](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/opencode/stream-json-cheatsheet.md): JSONL event shapes for OpenCode
- [OpenCode event mapping](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/opencode/untether-events.md): OpenCode JSONL to Untether event translation
- [Pi runner](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/pi/runner.md): Multi-provider auth, model and provider selection
- [Pi stream-json](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/pi/stream-json-cheatsheet.md): JSONL event shapes for Pi
- [Pi event mapping](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/runners/pi/untether-events.md): Pi JSONL to Untether event translation
- [Telegram transport](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/reference/transports/telegram.md): Bot API client, outbox, rate limiting, voice, forum topics

## Explanation

- [Architecture](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/explanation/architecture.md): How the pieces fit together
- [Routing and sessions](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/explanation/routing-and-sessions.md): Message routing, context resolution, session management
- [Plugin system](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/explanation/plugin-system.md): Entry points, discovery, and plugin lifecycle
- [Module map](https://github.com/littlebearapps/untether/blob/master/docs/explanation/module-map.md): Source code module overview
